resources.string: I am Danushka, an undergraduate at the University of Colombo, pursuing a Bachelor\'s in ICT. As an aspiring Android app developer, I specialize in Java, Kotlin, and the Android SDK. I focus on creating user-friendly apps, optimizing UI/UX, and ensuring high performance. Passionate about clean, maintainable code, I stay updated with the latest Android trends and strive to deliver quality solutions.
